description: Having met online and only talked on the phone a little, Ty Derrick doesn't really know what to expect when Marcus Tresor knocks on his door for the first time, but he's pleasantly surprised to see the hottie at his door. Marcus also had some initial concerns, but now that he's met Ty, he's sure the two of them will have no problem with each other. Ty has fantasized about fucking Marcus' little hole from day one, and now that he has him in the flesh, he has every intention of fulfilling that fantasy. Luckily, that's just what Marcus came over for, and he willingly lets Ty fuck him any way he wants it. Ty has his way with Marcus' tight little body before emptying his load all over his new little fuck buddy.Enjoy!
title: Blind Fate
